title: 1 Bedroom in Lake Shore East - Beautiful views!
posting_body: 1 Bedroom, 1.5 Baths with gorgeous views and 1100 square feet of living space!
This South facing unit allows for some of the best views the city has to offer.
You can sit on your jumbo terrace and take in abundant views of the lake, Monroe Harbor, Buckingham Fountain, Grant, Maggie Daley & Millennium Parks and the City Skyline!

Amenities in the unit include a gourmet kitchen, washer & dryer, living & dining space, bamboo floors, powder room, floor to ceiling windows with new electric blinds and an on suite master with a large walk-in custom closet and separate full bath.

Amenities in the building are some of the best in the area offering a full service doorman, on site management, state of the art workout room complete with floor to ceiling views, indoor pool, hot tub, steam room and indoor / outdoor common entertaining areas.
Right behind you, the building conveniently connects to the courtyard of Mariano's.
You are within a 1 block walk to numerous restaurants, a neighborhood park & dog park, and numerous restaurants.
You are also walking distance to the lake front path, and all of the parks mentioned above!
Parking available for rent in the building and averages around $250 a month.
